project.name: Interactive Cologne
project.description: INTERACTIVE COLOGNE is a one-week festival for talented hackers and designers to kick-off their own or others’ projects, refine or complete code collaboratively or just experiment. It is for startups, investors and entrepreneurs to meet in a creative atmosphere to discuss hot topics and network with other technology industry professionals who share similar passions and social interests.
project.what_we_did: Together with Web de Cologne e.V., Thierhoff Consulting, c/o pop & C’n’B and some creative minds of Colognes hacker and startup scene we organized the whole event and developed the website.
